name: Retrophobia
description:
Welcome to our demake of the investigative horror game, Phasmophobia! 

For our entry, we took a game we're passionate about and converted it into a beautiful 2D minimalistic retro aesthetic, all while maintaining a focus on keeping the original gameplay intact.

Whether you're a veteran ghost hunter or this is your first time playing a game like this, we sincerely hope you enjoy your time with us!

Controls

[Arrow Keys] Movement

[C] Pickup Item

[X] Use Item

[Z] Swap Item

[Esc] or [Enter]  Journal/Submit Evidence

Important Gameplay Information:

- The Ghost is invisible

- If the Ghost isn't invisible, RUN & HIDE. 

- Every Ghost variety leaves 3 different pieces of Evidence

- Mark all 3 pieces of evidence in your journal [Esc/Enter] to win.

Not As Important But Still Relevant Advice:

- Ghosts linger around the room they died in

- The EMF is really good at finding ghosts quickly

- Ghosts only hunt when sanity is less than 50%

- If you're being chased, break line-of-sight, then hide

- Sanity Pills will instantly restore 25% of your sanity

- Use the computer to view cameras
